long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To access the full features of our software, including design extraction, please install it on your computer. Download from: https://opchon.com/autocrawl/download

Introducing Our Chrome Extension for Amazon Merch:
Download multiple merch designs in bulk for easy access and modification.
Use the quick search feature to locate specific products or designs instantly.
Count similar products on Amazon Merch to gain valuable market insights.
Integrates seamlessly with your Amazon Merch seller dashboard.
Navigate effortlessly with a user-friendly, intuitive interface.
Moves BSR (Best Sellers Rank) and Date First Available closer to the price for quick reference.
Note: This extension requires additional software (compatible with MacOS/Windows) to access the full feature set.

Streamline your workflow and enhance your design process with our powerful Chrome Extension.

Change Log
Version 2.7
Added prompt creation feature to redesign a shirt on Amazon Merch

Version 2.4
Updated search button functionality (new code implemented)

Version 2.0
Faster downloads from Merch Intel

Version 1.5
Removed AI-based image resizing

Version 1.4
Adjusted BSR (Best Sellers Rank) and Date First Available placement closer to price

Version 1.3
Removed browser-based downloads; downloads now available via the app (app update required)

Version 1.2
Added language selection feature
